title: How to accept constructive criticism - Quora

response.answer_text: Constructive criticism is only nice when it’s asked for otherwise it comes off as nit picky. usually if you’re looking to improve something, others opinions is the best way to do so however if you’re fine travelling along your own path, let people know you’re not looking for their opinion.
You answered your own question, ACCEPT IT. Simply put, accept it. You don’t have to like it, agree with it, etc but accept it and move on.
